quest.name: To Catch a Cutthroat
journal: U'jughal needs a strong adventurer to eliminate the dread pirate Drysnagl.
U'jughal wants you to hunt down Dawson's impostor, Drysnagl. Slip into the Serpent's Tongue and hunt down the dread pirate.
You have delivered Drysnagl his comeuppance. Report the good news to U'jughal.
U'jughal breathes easier knowing there is one less Serpent Reaver to worry about.
objectives: Slay Drysnagl in the Serpent's Tongue.

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: Have to hand it to the villain Drysnagl─he's got gall. Most men wanted for sixty-four counts wouldn't dare leave the safety of the Serpent's Tongue. No doubt he's scurried back there by now.

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: It's only a matter of time until the crystals end up in Sahagin hands and we're all drowning in Leviathan's wake.

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: Drysnagl's a cutthroat among cutthroats─he wields his axe with sharp wits and crushing strength.

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: Needless to say, seeking him out and rendering justice will be far from easy. The Navigator guide your blade!

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: Ha! And here I feared I was sending you to your death! Glad you gave that rapscallion Drysnagl his comeuppance!

dialogue.name: UJUGHAL
dialogue.text: A womanman who can dispense justice will always have a place by my side.

obj.n: Long Walk off a Short Pier
